data.description: WHO WE AREApex Fintech Solutions (AFS) powers innovation and the future of digital wealth management by processing millions of transactions daily, to simplify, automate, and facilitate access to financial markets for all. Our robust suite of fintech solutions enables us to support clients such as Stash, Betterment, SoFi, and Webull, and more than 20 million of our clients' customers. Collectively, AFS creates an environment in which companies with the biggest ideas in fintech are empowered to change the world. As a global organization, we have offices in Austin, Dallas, Chicago, New York, Portland, Belfast, and Manila.If you are seeking a fast-paced and entrepreneurial environment where you'll have the opportunity to make an immediate impact, and you have the guts to change everything, this is the place for you. AFS has received a number of prestigious industry awards, including:2021, 2020, 2019, and 2018 Best Wealth Management Company - presented by Fintech Breakthrough Awards2021 Most Innovative Companies - presented by Fast Company2021 Best API & Best Trading Technology - presented by Global Fintech AwardsABOUT THIS ROLEApex Fintech Solutions delivers speed, efficiency & flexibility through technology solutions to firms ranging from innovative start-ups to blue-chip brands who choose to grow with us. We embrace a culture of growth, experimentation, and creativity. Employees of Apex are asked to exercise their own responsibility and freedom, allowing each person to have a measurable impact on the business and provide plenty of opportunities for advancement and personal growth. Sound like something you would want to be a part of? We're hiring!Start your career by joining a thriving, successful team enabling innovation within the financial services industry. AFS is seeking interns to join our various team within our technology and product divisions. As a member of this team, you'll have a large impact on the firm by adding your relevant experience to our organization and employees in a rapidly growing environment. You’ll also learn about change management, performance management, and organizational development. Additionally, our diverse business streams afford you the unique opportunity to grow across a variety of verticals, engaging you in unique challenges, projects, and technologies.To be considered, you must be able to work 40 hours per week during our summer program in one of our office locations. Opportunities are available within the following groups:Business Operations and Commercial DivisionsSoftware Engineering Intern (10): This role will work alongside senior software engineers to design and develop scalable applications, gaining hands-on experience with coding and agile practices.Product Intern (4): This role will work alongside senior product managers to help shape strategies, conduct market analysis, and help launch and refine current and new products/solutions.Technology PMO Intern (2): This role will assist technology project/program management teams in coordinating project timelines, optimizing workflows, and contributing to reporting and process improvements.The skills you’ll need to succeed:Be currently enrolled in a full-time Bachelor's degree program; junior or senior standing preferredExcellent problem-solving skills with high attention to detailEffective interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skillsProficient in Microsoft 365Interest in FintechPreferred skills:Relevant work experience or work experience in a professional environment (e.g. internships, summer positions, school jobs, etc)Strong analytical skillsDesire to take ownership of projects and ideasAbility to work independently as well as in team environmentAttention to detail and a high degree of initiative and adaptability#LI-DNI​Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties, or responsibilities required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities, and activities may change at any time with or without notice.Our RewardsWe offer a robust package of employee perks and benefits, including healthcare benefits (medical, dental and vision, EAP), competitive PTO, 401k match, parental leave, and HSA contribution match. We also provide our employees with a paid subscription to the Calm app and offer generous external learning and tuition reimbursement benefits. At AFS , we offer a hybrid work schedule for most roles that allows employees to have the flexibility of working from home and one of our primary offices.Salary Range$0-$50The annual base salary range for this position is noted above. Exact compensation offered may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, experience, and office location.EEO StatementApex Fintech Solutions is an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, sexual orientation, and gender identity), national origin, age, disability, veteran status, marital status, or any other protected characteristic. Our hiring practices ensure that all qualified applicants receive fair consideration without regard to these characteristics.Disability StatementApex Fintech Solutions is committed to creating an inclusive and accessible workplace for all candidates, including those with disabilities. We are dedicated to ensuring equal employment opportunities and providing reasonable accommodations to qualified individuals with disabilities. If you require reasonable accommodations to participate in the application or interview process, please submit your request via the Candidate Accommodation Requests Form. We will work with you to provide the necessary accommodations to ensure your full participation in our hiring process.
